price: Allāhu sì máa mú òdodo ṣẹ pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ Rẹ̀, àwọn ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ ìbáà kórira rẹ̀.
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
